data.title: Library acquisitions, August 2021
data.meta_description: 183 new titles were added to the library last month.
data.text:
183 new titles were added to the library last month.

This list covers new titles but is not an exhaustive list of the library's recent acquisitions. The first volume received by the library of a new journal or multi-volume work is listed, but second and subsequent volumes do not appear here. Titles are listed in call number order within collection and/or subject area groupings. Please consult Hollis for comprehensive coverage of the library's holdings.

General Collection

Philosophy and Religion (LC Class B)

Against the physicists / Sextus Empiricus ; [translated and edited by] Richard Bett. Cambridge : Cambridge University Press, 2012.

Against the logicians / Sextus Empiricus ; translated and edited by Richard Bett. Cambridge, UK ; New York : Cambridge University Press, 2005.

Outlines of scepticism / Sextus Empiricus ; edited by Julia Annas, Jonathan Barnes. Cambridge, U.K. ; New York : Cambridge University Press, 2000.

Confusi dalla vostra scienza : note medievali sul binomio doctrina/ignorantia / Riccardo Saccenti. Milano : La vita felice, marzo 2021.

Philosophical psychology in Arabic thought and the Latin Aristotelianism of the 13th century / edited by Luis Xavier López-Farjeat, Jörg Alejandro Tellkamp. Paris : J Vrin, 2013.

La philosophie arabe à l'étude : sens, limites et défis d'une discipline moderne = Studying Arabic philosophy : meaning, limits and challenges of a modern discipline / sous la direction de Jean-Baptiste Brenet et Olga L. Lizzini. Paris : Librairie philosophique J Vrin, 2019.

Femmes, mysticisme et prophétisme en Europe : du Moyen Âge à l'époque moderne / sous la direction d'Hélène Michon, Élise Boillet et Denise Ardesi. Paris : Classiques Garnier, 2021.

He Thessalonikē kata tē Latinokratia : hoi epistoles tou Papa Innokentiou III : pros tē Latinikē koinotēta tēs Thessalonikēs / Kōnstantinos Ph. Batsiolas. Kalamaria TK : Methexis, 2019.

Carteggio durante l'ultima fase del concilio di Trento (1561-1563) / Egidio Foscarari, Giovanni Morone ; edizione critica a cura di Matteo Al Kalak. Münster : Aschendorff Verlag, [2018]

Gli ordini mendicanti : il secolo delle origini / Maria Teresa Dolso. Roma : Carocci editore, maggio 2021.
